ja.name: 上岡 玲子（Ryoko Ueoka）
ja.description: 上岡 玲子 Ryoko Ueoka 東京大学大学院工学系研究科先端学際工学専攻修了（博士（工学））、専門はライフログ、エモーショナルエンジニアリング。環境と身体、情報を接続しテクノロジーであらゆる人・環境のウェルビーング向上の実現を目指す研究者・起業家。2025年より東京工科大学片柳研究所教授、富山県立大学客員教授、（株）zeroinon取締役、（株）セック社外取締役/監査等委員兼務

en.name: Ryoko Ueoka
en.description:
Ryoko Ueoka Graduated from the Department of Advanced Interdisciplinary Studies, Graduate School of Engineering, The University of Tokyo (PhD in Engineering), specializing in life logs and emotional engineering. A researcher and entrepreneur who aims to improve the well-being of all people and environments through technology by connecting the environment, body, and information. 

From 2025, she will serve as a professor at the Katayanagi Research Institute, Tokyo University of Technology, a visiting professor at Toyama Prefectural University, a director at zeroinon Co., Ltd., and an outside auditor at SEC Co., Ltd.
